activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: The wh'ee'l is in good condition.
Adjust the driver’s s'ea't before you start.
This sp'ee'd is far too high.
The d'ie'sel engine is in the garage.

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the words with the pictures.
පදයන් පින්තූර සමග ගැලපන්න.
சொற்களைப் படங்களுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

example_dialogues.text_b: It is in the pencil case.

dialogues.text_b: It is in the vehicle servicing workshop.

dialogues.text_a: Where is the Maruti van ignition key?
dialogues.text_b: It is in the black cotton bag.
They are in the manager’s office.

dialogues.text_a: Where is the new technical instructor?
dialogues.text_b: She is in the driving simulator room.
It is in the bottom drawer.
He is in the inspection bay.

activity_1_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

examples.sentence:
The correct tire pressure is 32 psi. This tire has 38 psi.

The pressure is ……………….

content.sentence:
The normal range of the car engine temperature is 85–95 degrees Celsius. The temperature of this engine is 100 degrees Celsius.

The temperature of this engine is ………………….

The correct weight of the car battery is 12 kilograms. The weight of this battery is 12.5 kilograms.

The weight of this battery is ………………….

The acceptable tire pressure is 30–32 PSI. The tire pressure in this wheel is 28 PSI.

The tire pressure in this wheel is ………………….

The standard depth of tire tread is 3–4 millimeters. The depth of this tire tread is 2 millimeters.

 The depth of this tire tread is ………………….

The correct length of a fan belt is 90–95 centimeters. The length of this fan belt is 100 centimeters.

 The length of this fan belt is ………………….

The standard width of a brake pad is 8–9 centimeters. The width of this brake pad is 7 centimeters.

 The width of this brake pad is ………………….

The correct oil content of the gearbox is 1.5–1.8 liters. The oil content of this gearbox is 2 liters.

 The oil content of this gearbox is ………………….

The safe tire pressure for a van is 34–36 PSI. The tire pressure of this van is 36 PSI. 

 The tire pressure of this van is  ………………….

The recommended alignment angle is 0–2 degrees. The alignment angle of this wheel is 3 degrees.

 The alignment angle of this wheel is ………………….

The correct charging voltage of a car alternator is 13–14.5 volts. The charging voltage of this car alternator is 12 volts.

 The charging voltage of this car alternator is ………………….

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_d.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

Questions.question: What is the temperature of the car engine?
What is the correct temperature range for the diagnostic test?
What should be the weight of the battery?
What is the correct tire pressure reading?
. Where is the record book kept?

activity_b.text: I am checking the temperature of the car engine.
I am checking the length of the fan belt
I am checking the depth of the tire tread..
I am checking the width of the brake pad.
I am checking the oil content of the gearbox.
The battery is about 12.5 kilograms.The battery is about 500 grams  too heavy.
The fan belt is about 95 centimeters. The fan belt is about 5 centimeters too long.
The tire tread is about 4 millimeters.The tire tread is about 1 millimeter too shallow.
The brake pad is about 8 centimeters.The brake pad is about 2 millimeters too narrow.
The oil content of the gearbox is about 1.8 liters.The oil content of the gearbox is about 200 milliliters too high.
